latestVersion.termsOfUse: Access to this dataset is only for noncommercial use or for replicating the results of the manuscript.
latestVersion.termsOfAccess: Access to this dataset is only for noncommercial use or for replicating the results of the manuscript.

fields.value: Replication Data for: Quantifying Reputation and Success in Art

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset allows to reproduce the figures of the manuscript. Please refer to the README file for more details.

files.description: This table contains an anonymized list of the artists that we studied, their country of origin, total sales volume in the auction market, maximum auction sales price, and maximum gallery price (N=31,794).
files.label: artists.tab

dataFile.description: This table contains an anonymized list of the artists that we studied, their country of origin, total sales volume in the auction market, maximum auction sales price, and maximum gallery price (N=31,794).

files.description: For the sample of artists in artists.csv, this table contains the list of exhibits he/she had. Each exhibit is characterized by the index of the institution as it appears in institutions.csv, the year in which the exhibit occurred, and an index of whether or not the exhibit occurred in the artist’s home country (N=1,044,028).
files.label: careers.tab

dataFile.description: For the sample of artists in artists.csv, this table contains the list of exhibits he/she had. Each exhibit is characterized by the index of the institution as it appears in institutions.csv, the year in which the exhibit occurred, and an index of whether or not the exhibit occurred in the artist’s home country (N=1,044,028).

files.description: This table contains an anonymized list of the art institutions in the database along with their network-based ranking, their price-based ranking, and the expert grade they received (N=23,570).
files.label: institutions.tab

dataFile.description: This table contains an anonymized list of the art institutions in the database along with their network-based ranking, their price-based ranking, and the expert grade they received (N=23,570).

files.description: We de-anonymized the top ten institutions.
files.label: institutions-top-10.tab

dataFile.description: We de-anonymized the top ten institutions.

files.description: This table contains an anonymized list of all institutions along with their network-based ranking for each year (N=895,660).
files.label: rankings.tab

dataFile.description: This table contains an anonymized list of all institutions along with their network-based ranking for each year (N=895,660).

files.description: This table contains an anonymized list of all pairs of institutions, along with the transition probabilities between these institutions for each year (N=12,033,246).
files.label: transitions.tab

dataFile.description: This table contains an anonymized list of all pairs of institutions, along with the transition probabilities between these institutions for each year (N=12,033,246).
